title: Trafalgar Squared with Robert Cahaly and Darren Bailey
itunes:title: Trafalgar Squared with Robert Cahaly and Darren Bailey
description:
Trafalgar Group's polls were some of the most accurate in both 2016 and 2020, and it's predicting great results for the GOP in 2022. Trafalgar founder Robert Cahaly gives his final pre-election read on the midterm races, and explains why Democrats should be worried so many of their incumbents are stuck under 50% in the polls. Plus, Illinois has lost population for eight years in a row. Now, the state is about to release thousands of criminals without bail. Are things getting so bad the state will elect a Republican? Gubernatorial candidate Darren Bailey joins Charlie to discuss his campaign.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
